lore: The body of this creature is at a temperature close to absolute zero even on the hottest days of summer. A cunning commander of Andolin had one freeze the surface of a lake on the eve of an important battle. After placing his army in what seemed like an unfavorable position, the enemy fell into the trap and divided their troops, half of whom crossed the lake. Then he had his Minotaur Earthshaker shatter the ice with its powerful mace. They wore heavy armor, so there were hardly any survivors.
menagerieDialog: (It appears to be calm, but you know a terrifying spectacle awaits its enemies.)
(This creature radiates an aura of violence. Perfect for decimating your foes.)
(You can tell it feels restless. Perhaps it knows a battle is coming.)
(This is perhaps the most serious and focused creature you've ever encountered. It will serve you well in battle.)
(It meets your gaze with a firm, confident, and yet obedient stare. This creature is well-suited for battle.)
name: Icewound Angel
